class.name: GFEntity
class.brief_description: A reference to an entity from a [GFWorld].

method.name: add_component
method.description: Adds component data to this reference's entity. The component is identified by a [Variant] that is coerced to an ID. To learn more about Variant coercion see [method GFWorld.coerce_id].

method.name: from
method.description: Creates a reference to an entity from a [Variant] coerced to an ID. If no world is specified, a default world is used. To learn more about Variant coercion see [method GFWorld.coerce_id].

method.name: get_component
method.description: Returns a reference to the component's data by the components's ID. Returns [code]null[/code] if the ID is not attatached to this reference's entity or if the ID is not a component. The component is identified by an ID coerced from a [Variant]. To learn more about Variant coercion see [method GFWorld.coerce_id].

method.name: get_id
method.description: Returns the ID of this reference's entity.

method.name: get_name
method.description: Returns the name of this entity.

method.name: get_world
method.description: Returns the world this reference's entity is from.

method.name: set_name
method.description: Sets the name of this entity.

method.name: spawn
method.description: Creates a new entity and returns a reference to it. If no world is specified, a default world is used.
